page.description: Returns the SQL username and password used for SQL connections.
page.syntax: Context.Session.GetSQLCredentials as L (ByRef Username as C, ByRef Password as C)

argument.name: ByRef Username as C
argument.description: The variable to receive the value of the SQL username.

argument.name: ByRef Password as C
argument.description: The variable to receive the value of the SQL password.

page.discussion: Context.Session.GetSQLCredentials() if successful returns the SQL username and password used for SQL connections. See *[link:Session.GetSQLCredentials@Session.GetSQLCredentials() Method]* for more details. Check *[link:Context.Session.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
